commitResults.messageBody:
Add 'add' as one command, to retain level 2.
Any non-command are handled as the default for switch cases

commitResults.messageTitle: Add proper error handling using exceptions.
commitResults.messageBody:
No longer use print lines for error, use KurokishiException class instead.
All methods use exceptions too instead of printing messages directly.
Error handling is now consistent.

Kurokishi.java main code is shortened significantly
Added new packages to better organise code: command, parser, ui
Completed Ui.java, TaskList.java and Command.java

commitResults.messageTitle: Complete command package:
commitResults.messageBody:
command package handles all the commands parsed by inputs.
Command.java is an interface, which all other specific command implements.

commitResults.messageTitle: Finalise parser and main, refactored code runs as intended.

Delete dead code of old main() logic after refactoring.

Current refactored code works after merging to master branch.
Old code is redundant, hence deleted.

commitResults.messageBody:
Kurokishi can read date and time for inputs:
Deadline and Event can take in date only or date and time only or both
in the yyyy-MM-dd or yyyy-MM-dd HHmm format.

Event also compares /to time to be after /from time.
